attributes.description: Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager JP Thomas and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information, or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us at Motus Select Vanderbijlpark.

attributes.description:
This absolutely stunning PORSCHE CAYENNE S COUPE is up for grabs! loaded with cool features such as -

• electric deployable towbar 

• leather interior 

• semi electric seats

• electric tailgate 

• multi function steering wheel 

• paddle shift 

• mode switch on steering wheel 

• cruise control 

• sport chrono package 

• touch screen media interface 

• electric spoiler
• Apple carplay

• eco stop/start function 

• driving mode select

• sports suspension 

• navigation 

• porsche active safe 

• dual climate control 

• voice control 

• reverse camera 

• front and rear parking sensors 

• auto LED headlights 

• front and rear half of car wrapped in clear paint protection film 
	Shop for a new car or used car, start your research Online here, You will find great Inventory of cars for sale by local car dealers.

attributes.description:
Audi A3 2004 - on A3 1.0t Fsi Stronic (30 Tfsi)
Sporty Audi A3 in excellent condition. Full service history. central locking, airbag, aircon, power steering with controls on steering wheel. Radio with bluetooth and USB port to charge phone. Automatic transmission, comfortable drive and park distance control to assist with parking. Electric windows and mirrors. This extraordinary Audi has a sunroof and also shows average fuel consumption. Visit your KIA Konfidence dealership in the Westrand, situated in Wilropark, Roodepoort and book this beauty for a test drive. Nationwide delivery.
